Question here : If i have [Thrummingbird](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thrummingbird) with first strike on it and a bunch of 1/1 arcbounds, if I attack with all, does the [Thrummingbird](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thrummingbird) deal its damage first and as a result of it, i put +1/+1 counters on all my arcbounds THEN my arcbounds become 2/2's and do damage or does the counters land on my arcbounds after the combat?
